description: Parameters for generating a secret with the Fuzzy Key Recovery system

setSize.description: number of words in the original and recovery word list

corpusSize.description: size of the set of words to choose from

correctThreshold.description:
minimum number of correct words need to unlock keys
less than or equal to setSize

prime.description: a prime number in the range corpusSize < prime < 2 * corpusSize

extractor.description: an array of numbers used in the key recovery process

salt.description: salt to slow brute force attacks. Represents an array of bytes

sketch.description: an array of numbers used in the key recovery process

hash.description: A 512-bit hash of the original words
